Summary: Biochemical reaction from rosuvastatin to rosuvastatin acyl glucuronide. This interaction can be catalyzed by UGT1A3 or UGT1A1.
Biochemical reaction from rosuvastatin to n-desmethyl rosuvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C9 or CYP2C19.
Biochemical reaction from rosuvastatin acyl glucuronide to rosuvastatin lactone.
Transport from rosuvastatin to rosuvastatin. This interaction is catalyzed by SLCO2B1.
Transport from rosuvastatin to rosuvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by ABCB11, ABCG2 or ABCC2.
Transport from rosuvastatin to rosuvastatin. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLCO1B1, SLC10A1, SLCO2B1 or SLCO1B3.
